column4: when ever someone get's a chance and is willing, I need help with something
I have a dell Inspiron 8200, and I'm trying to install the utils and it keeps telling me that it can't find /proc/i8k
well...i sold my 8100 about 2.5 years ago....but once upon a time i dealt with those drivers
did you get any output from that?
although from the looks of things i think you may have to compile a new kernel
oh cool, if you didn't get any output from the modprobe command it should have loaded. try the previous command again (the 'lsmod' one...hit the up arrow a few times to get it back)
